content: call me london jumper pattern by martina maskova / @m_art_inak this jumper is my love letter to london when i wear it a little part of me is there and a big part of me is happy the pattern is free it has been tech edited but it has not been tested if you still want to support me somehow you can buy me a virtual coffee https //ko-fi com/m_art_inak yarn main colour jamieson and smith 2 ply jumper weight 100% shetland wool 115m per 25g ball 4 ply / fingering weight yarn in colourway 01 6 7 7 8 8 8 9 9 10 10 11 12 12 13 13 balls estimated contrast colours various jamieson and smith 2 ply jumper weight 100% shetland wool 115m per 25g ball 4 ply / fingering weight yarn you can change the contrast colours or use different shades of red and blue for different motives or ribbing red 2 ply jumper weight in colourway 1403 2 balls for sizes 1-11 3 balls for sizes 12-15 blue 2 ply jumper weight in colourway 142 2 balls for sizes 1-11 3 balls for sizes 12-15 feel free to use different colours and colour combinations note that adding length or repeating an extra colourwork chart will consume more yarn needles 3 0mm / us 2 5 for ribbing dpns or long circular needles for magic loop 3 5mm / us 4 for main colour dpns or long circular needles for magic loop 3 75mm / us 5 for colourwork circular needles 80 cm / 32 inch or needle sizes necessary to obtain gauge gauge in stockinette st in the round on 3 5mm / us 4 needles sleeves 10 x 10 cm 24 sts x 34 rounds in colourwork st in the round on 3 75mm/ us 5 needles yoke body 10 x 10 cm 26 sts x 27 rounds other 3 stitch markers of different colours waste yarn tapestry needle pattern copyright by martina maskova @m_art_inak 2023 for personal use only 1 skills / techniques knit purl colourwork short row german short row duplicate stitch invisible increase left cast on cast off german short row rs on the right side knit x sts and turn your work to ws ws hold yarn in front slip one stitch as if to purl and pull the yarn directly over the right-hand needle this rotation creates a double stitch ds as the stitch has two legs now bring the yarn back to front purl the next stitch tightly and continue purling according to the pattern turn to rs rs slip one stitch as if to purl pull the yarn directly over the right-hand needle until it creates a double stitch knit the next stitch tightly and continue knitting according to the pattern turn x sts before the ds repeat until there are x sts according to the pattern knit 1 round where you knit the ds together as if it were one increase make 1 left m1l
